org.jgentleframework.context.aop
Interface Pointcut<T extends Matching>

All Known Subinterfaces:
MatcherPointcut<T,V>, PointcutOfAll, PointcutOfClassFilter<T>, PointcutOfConstructorFilter<T>, PointcutOfFieldFilter<T>, PointcutOfMethodFilter<T>, PointcutOfParameterFilter<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut, AnnotatedWithMatcher, ConstructorAnnotatedWithMatcher, FieldAnnotatedWithMatcher, MethodAnnotatedWithMatcher, ParameterAnnotatedWithMatcher, TypeAnnotatedWithMatcher
public interface Pointcut<T extends Matching>

Core JGentle pointcut abstraction.

Author:
